document_data.name: Alask's Arrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Alask's Arrow''' was an inn and tavern located in [[Daerlun]], [[Sembia]], ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1358}}. It was owned and operated by [[Alask|Alask "Eagle-eyes"]] who, before he retired, held the reputation as the best archer in the lands around the [[Dragon Reach]].
document_data.Services: The typical price for room and board was 1 [[gp]] per person per night. Guests could expect to be charged twice or thrice this much if they caused damage or got violent.
